noneditablegrid.name: quotationdetail
noneditablegrid.query: select * from tbl_quotationdetails join tbl_quotation On quotation_quotationid=quotationdetails_quotationid Join tbl_product On quotationdetails_productid= product_productid where quotation_quotationid=$QUERYSTRING_quotationid$
noneditablegrid.title: Quotation Detail
